snippet.title: Engineer Arena - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Take on your friends and upgrade on the fly in this 1 to 4 player split-screen arena shooter!

--

Engineer Arena is a fun and frantic shooter centered around earning "bits" used to buy weapons, grenades, and new abilities at any time, and using those to defeat your friends in classic console-inspired split-screen FPS action.

--

Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1118950/Engineer_Arena/
Itch.io! https://waveparadigm.itch.io/engineer-arena
Twitter! https://twitter.com/EngineerArena
Discord! https://discord.gg/EqnSwwx
Website! https://waveparadigm.dev

--

Music:
ADHD by daPlaque (ft. Anke Angel)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ai8f3MztcMI
